Intercepted

The people behind The Intercept’s fearless reporting and incisive commentary discuss the crucial issues of our time: national security, civil liberties, foreign policy, and criminal justice. New episodes on Wednesday.

Tracking how goods made by Uyghurs toiling in plastics factories end up in U.S. stores.
